tasks.title: Create Test Files for Untested Source Files
tasks.description: Create comprehensive test files for all 130 source files that currently lack corresponding test files. Tests should follow the project's inline testing pattern and cover core functionality, edge cases, and error handling.
tasks.details: This task covers creating test files for all untested source files identified in the codebase. Tests should be placed in the test/ directory following the same structure as src/. Each test file should test the corresponding source file's functionality comprehensively.

subtasks.title: Create tests for consumer modules
subtasks.description: Create test files for: src/consumers/console_consumer.rs, src/consumers/tcp_consumer.rs. Test consumer functionality, error handling, and integration with streams.

subtasks.title: Create tests for graph HTTP server modules
subtasks.description: Create test files for all graph HTTP server modules: src/graph/http_server/error.rs, src/graph/http_server/graph_server.rs, src/graph/http_server/handler.rs, src/graph/http_server/middleware.rs, src/graph/http_server/mod.rs, src/graph/http_server/nodes/consumer.rs, src/graph/http_server/nodes/mod.rs, src/graph/http_server/nodes/path_router_transformer.rs, src/graph/http_server/nodes/producer.rs, src/graph/http_server/types.rs. Test HTTP server functionality, request handling, middleware, and graph integration.

subtasks.title: Create tests for graph nodes - array operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for array operation nodes: src/graph/nodes/array_concat.rs, src/graph/nodes/array_contains.rs, src/graph/nodes/array_find.rs, src/graph/nodes/array_index_of.rs, src/graph/nodes/array_join.rs, src/graph/nodes/array_length.rs, src/graph/nodes/array_modify.rs, src/graph/nodes/array_reverse.rs, src/graph/nodes/array_slice.rs. Test array manipulation operations, edge cases, and Message<T> handling.

subtasks.title: Create tests for graph nodes - CSV operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for CSV operation nodes: src/graph/nodes/csv_parse.rs, src/graph/nodes/csv_stringify.rs. Test CSV parsing and serialization, error handling, and various CSV formats.

subtasks.title: Create tests for graph nodes - database operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for database operation nodes: src/graph/nodes/database_operation.rs, src/graph/nodes/database_query.rs. Test database operations, query execution, error handling, and connection management.

subtasks.title: Create tests for graph nodes - utility operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for utility nodes: src/graph/nodes/drop.rs, src/graph/nodes/http_request.rs, src/graph/nodes/repeat.rs. Test utility operations, HTTP requests, and repeat functionality.

subtasks.title: Create tests for graph nodes - JSON operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for JSON operation nodes: src/graph/nodes/json_parse.rs, src/graph/nodes/jsonpath.rs, src/graph/nodes/json_stringify.rs. Test JSON parsing, JSONPath queries, and JSON serialization.

subtasks.title: Create tests for graph nodes - math operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for math operation nodes: src/graph/nodes/math_function.rs, src/graph/nodes/math_hyperbolic.rs, src/graph/nodes/math_logarithmic.rs, src/graph/nodes/math_min_max.rs, src/graph/nodes/math_operation.rs, src/graph/nodes/math_random.rs, src/graph/nodes/math_rounding.rs, src/graph/nodes/math_trigonometric.rs, src/graph/nodes/math_utility.rs. Test mathematical operations, edge cases, and special values (NaN, infinity).

subtasks.title: Create tests for graph nodes - object operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for object operation nodes: src/graph/nodes/object_entries.rs, src/graph/nodes/object_has_property.rs, src/graph/nodes/object_keys.rs, src/graph/nodes/object_merge.rs, src/graph/nodes/object_property.rs, src/graph/nodes/object_random_member.rs, src/graph/nodes/object_values.rs. Test object manipulation operations, property access, and merging.

subtasks.title: Create tests for graph nodes - string operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for string operation nodes: src/graph/nodes/string_case.rs, src/graph/nodes/string_char.rs, src/graph/nodes/string_concat.rs, src/graph/nodes/string_index_of.rs, src/graph/nodes/string_join.rs, src/graph/nodes/string_length.rs, src/graph/nodes/string_match.rs, src/graph/nodes/string_pad.rs, src/graph/nodes/string_predicate.rs, src/graph/nodes/string_repeat.rs, src/graph/nodes/string_replace.rs, src/graph/nodes/string_reverse.rs, src/graph/nodes/string_search.rs, src/graph/nodes/string_slice.rs, src/graph/nodes/string_split.rs, src/graph/nodes/string_split_lines.rs, src/graph/nodes/string_split_words.rs, src/graph/nodes/string_trim.rs. Test string manipulation operations, edge cases, and Unicode handling.

subtasks.title: Create tests for graph nodes - TCP operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for TCP operation nodes: src/graph/nodes/tcp_receive.rs, src/graph/nodes/tcp_request.rs, src/graph/nodes/tcp_send.rs. Test TCP communication, error handling, and network operations.

subtasks.title: Create tests for graph nodes - XML operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for XML operation nodes: src/graph/nodes/xml_parse.rs, src/graph/nodes/xml_stringify.rs. Test XML parsing and serialization, error handling, and various XML formats.

subtasks.title: Create tests for graph nodes - utility operations (trace, wrap, xor)
subtasks.description: Create test files for utility nodes: src/graph/nodes/trace.rs, src/graph/nodes/wrap.rs, src/graph/nodes/xor.rs. Test debugging utilities, wrapping operations, and XOR operations.

subtasks.title: Create tests for graph TCP server
subtasks.description: Create test files for TCP server: src/graph/tcp_server/mod.rs, src/graph/tcp_server/server.rs. Test TCP server functionality, connection handling, and message routing.

subtasks.title: Create tests for core modules
subtasks.description: Create test files for core modules: src/lib.rs, src/metrics/mod.rs, src/ml/mod.rs. Test module exports, metrics functionality, and ML module integration.

subtasks.title: Create tests for producer modules
subtasks.description: Create test files for producer modules: src/producers/range_producer.rs, src/producers/tcp_producer.rs. Test producer functionality, stream generation, and error handling.

subtasks.title: Create tests for transformers - array operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for array transformer operations: src/transformers/array_concat_transformer.rs, src/transformers/array_contains_transformer.rs, src/transformers/array_find_transformer.rs, src/transformers/array_index_of_transformer.rs, src/transformers/array_join_transformer.rs, src/transformers/array_length_transformer.rs, src/transformers/array_modify_transformer.rs, src/transformers/array_reverse_transformer.rs, src/transformers/array_slice_transformer.rs. Test array transformation operations, edge cases, and stream processing.

subtasks.title: Create tests for transformers - CSV operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for CSV transformer operations: src/transformers/csv_parse_transformer.rs, src/transformers/csv_stringify_transformer.rs. Test CSV parsing and serialization transformers, error handling, and stream processing.

subtasks.title: Create tests for transformers - database operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for database transformer operations: src/transformers/database_operation_transformer.rs, src/transformers/database_query_transformer.rs. Test database transformation operations, query execution, and error handling.

subtasks.title: Create tests for transformers - utility operations (delay, drop)
subtasks.description: Create test files for utility transformers: src/transformers/delay_transformer.rs, src/transformers/drop_transformer.rs. Test delay functionality, drop operations, and timing behavior.

subtasks.title: Create tests for transformers - HTTP operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for HTTP transformer: src/transformers/http_request_transformer.rs. Test HTTP request functionality, error handling, and response processing.

subtasks.title: Create tests for transformers - JSON operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for JSON transformer operations: src/transformers/json_parse_transformer.rs, src/transformers/jsonpath_transformer.rs, src/transformers/json_stringify_transformer.rs. Test JSON parsing, JSONPath queries, and JSON serialization transformers.

subtasks.title: Create tests for transformers - math operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for math transformer operations: src/transformers/math_function_transformer.rs, src/transformers/math_hyperbolic_transformer.rs, src/transformers/math_logarithmic_transformer.rs, src/transformers/math_min_max_transformer.rs, src/transformers/math_operation_transformer.rs, src/transformers/math_random_transformer.rs, src/transformers/math_rounding_transformer.rs, src/transformers/math_trigonometric_transformer.rs, src/transformers/math_utility_transformer.rs. Test mathematical transformation operations, edge cases, and special values.

subtasks.title: Create tests for transformers - object operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for object transformer operations: src/transformers/object_entries_transformer.rs, src/transformers/object_has_property_transformer.rs, src/transformers/object_keys_transformer.rs, src/transformers/object_merge_transformer.rs, src/transformers/object_property_transformer.rs, src/transformers/object_random_member_transformer.rs, src/transformers/object_values_transformer.rs. Test object transformation operations, property access, and merging.

subtasks.title: Create tests for transformers - process operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for process transformer: src/transformers/process_transformer.rs. Test process execution, output handling, and error management.

subtasks.title: Create tests for transformers - utility operations (repeat, trace)
subtasks.description: Create test files for utility transformers: src/transformers/repeat_transformer.rs, src/transformers/trace_transformer.rs. Test repeat functionality and debugging utilities.

subtasks.title: Create tests for transformers - string operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for string transformer operations: src/transformers/string_case_transformer.rs, src/transformers/string_char_transformer.rs, src/transformers/string_concat_transformer.rs, src/transformers/string_index_of_transformer.rs, src/transformers/string_join_transformer.rs, src/transformers/string_length_transformer.rs, src/transformers/string_match_transformer.rs, src/transformers/string_pad_transformer.rs, src/transformers/string_predicate_transformer.rs, src/transformers/string_repeat_transformer.rs, src/transformers/string_replace_transformer.rs, src/transformers/string_reverse_transformer.rs, src/transformers/string_search_transformer.rs, src/transformers/string_slice_transformer.rs, src/transformers/string_split_transformer.rs, src/transformers/string_split_lines_transformer.rs, src/transformers/string_split_words_transformer.rs, src/transformers/string_trim_transformer.rs. Test string transformation operations, edge cases, and Unicode handling.

subtasks.title: Create tests for transformers - TCP operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for TCP transformer operations: src/transformers/tcp_receive_transformer.rs, src/transformers/tcp_request_transformer.rs, src/transformers/tcp_send_transformer.rs. Test TCP transformation operations, network communication, and error handling.

subtasks.title: Create tests for transformers - utility operations (wrap, xor)
subtasks.description: Create test files for utility transformers: src/transformers/wrap_transformer.rs, src/transformers/xor_transformer.rs. Test wrapping operations and XOR transformations.

subtasks.title: Create tests for transformers - XML operations
subtasks.description: Create test files for XML transformer operations: src/transformers/xml_parse_transformer.rs, src/transformers/xml_stringify_transformer.rs. Test XML parsing and serialization transformers, error handling, and various XML formats.

subtasks.title: Run all new tests and fix any failures
subtasks.description: Run all newly created test files using 'devenv shell -- ./bin/test' and fix any compilation errors, test failures, or issues. Ensure all tests pass and follow the project's testing patterns.
